segments.text: Is there anything I can do for you , Mr . King ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm leaving for Shanghai tomorrow morning . When do I have to settle my bill ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it all right for you to pay the bill this evening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That will do . Where shall I go to pay the money ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: At the Cashier's Counter of our hotel , right in the lobby downstairs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you please get the bill ready before supper ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . Is your companion leaving for Shanghai with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , he will stay here for two more days . Please keep the room for him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Shall I make out a single bill or two separate bills ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I'll surely have the bill ready for this evening .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will you give the bill to me at around six o'clock ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . By the way , do you have any comment to make on our hotel ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have had a good stay here . Your service is wonderful . I'm very satisfied with it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for your compliments . You're welcome to our hotel again .
segments.speaker: S1
